surface_layer.definition: A radiofrequency coil used to transmit radiofrequency signals during an MRI examination.

deep_layer.mechanism: Generates a radiofrequency field to excite proton spins within the patient's body
deep_layer.origin: Part of the MRI system, designed for signal transmission

epistemic_metadata.source: Extraction from Radiofrequency coil - Wikipedia, Basic Principles of and Practical Guide to Clinical MRI Radiofrequency Coils | RadioGraphics
